sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  Center,
  Flex,
  Heading,
  Image,
  Spacer,
  Stack,
  Text,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import Shivam from "../Image/Shivam.JPG"

const About = () => {
  return (
    <Stack >
    <Box id="about" p={10}>
      <Heading>About Me</Heading>
      <Box
        w="90%"
        h="100%"
        display="flex"
        justifyContent="space-evenly"
        alignItems="center"
        direction={{ base: 'column', md: 'row' }}
        >
        <Box w="40%">
          <Heading display="inline">
            Hey ! I'm
            <Heading display="inline" id="user-detail-name"> Shivam</Heading>
          </Heading>
          <Text id="user-detail-intro">Strong in design and integration with intuitive problem-solving
skills.Proficient in HTML,CSS,JAVASCRIPT and MERN STACK.
Passionate about implementing and launching new projects</Text>
          <Button>CONTACT ME</Button>
          <Button>RESUME</Button>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Image
             borderRadius="full"
            boxSize="20rem"
            src={Shivam}
            alt="SHIVAM"
            />
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
            </Stack>
  );
};

export default About;
